name: hexabot-plugin-ollama
description: The Ollama Plugin Extension for Hexabot Chatbot / Agent Builder that provides a custom block for Generative AI + RAG

scripts.release: npm version patch && git push origin --tags && npm publish

dependencies.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
dependencies.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags

author: Hexastack
